returns.withinLimits: Whether the amount is within limits

freeze().details: Can only be called by the account itself (via a previous UserOp).

params.evaluator: Address of the Wardex evaluator (signs approval tokens)

setEntryPoint(address).details: Set this to your ERC-4337 EntryPoint address in production.

validateUserOp((address,uint256,bytes,by.details: Checks:      1. Account is not frozen      2. UserOp signature contains a valid Wardex approval      3. Transaction value is within spending limits

params.userOpHash: Hash of the UserOperation (for signature verification)

returns.validationData: 0 if valid, 1 if invalid (per ERC-4337 spec)

checkSpendingLimit(address,address,uint2.notice: Check if a transaction value is within spending limits.

freeze().notice: Freeze the account - blocks ALL transactions.

getEvaluator(address).notice: Get the evaluator address for an account.

initialize(address,uint256,uint256).notice: Initialize Wardex protection for a smart account.

isFrozen(address).notice: Check if an account is frozen.

isInitialized(address).notice: Check if an account is initialized with Wardex.

setEntryPoint(address).notice: Set the trusted EntryPoint for validateUserOp calls.

setSpendingLimit(address,uint256,uint256.notice: Set spending limits for a specific token.

spendingLimits(address,address).notice: Spending limits per account per token (address(0) = ETH)

unfreeze().notice: Unfreeze the account - resumes normal operation.

validateUserOp((address,uint256,bytes,by.notice: Validates a UserOperation for the EntryPoint.
